value.name: If You Were There: Missing People and the Marks They Leave Behind by Francisco Garcia
value.description: Told through the eyes of Francisco Garcia, whose own father went missing when he was seven years old, If You Were There is a moving and well researched work of non-fiction about missing people. What are the motivations for these people to up-and-leave,

value.name: Francisco Garcia’s Moving Exploration of the World of Missing People
value.description: This question lies at the heart of journalist Francisco Garcia’s debut book If You Were There: Missing People and the Marks They Leave Behind (Mudlark), which explores the missing persons crisis which has exploded in the past ten years.

value.name: ‘My dad is just one of the more than 180,000 people reported missing in the UK each year’
value.description: When Francisco Garcia was seven, his father, Christobal, left the family in the dead of night and disappeared. He has been missing ever since. Garcia asks why this happened, as he searches for a lost

value.name: GRAPHIC: NYPD officer accused of violent arrest with Taser during social distancing patrol

value.name: Mexican president draws US into dispute over governor facing money laundering and organized crime charges
value.description: Mexico has made little headway defusing a bizarre standoff over the possible arrest of a a sitting state governor facing charges of tax evasion, money laundering and organized crime But President Andrés Manuel López Obrador made one thing clear Thursday: Any diplomatic documents the United States sends to Mexico are at risk of being published by the president himself.

value.name: Mexican president draws the U.S. into a dispute over governor
value.description: A Mexican judge has issued an arrest order for the governor of the northern border state of Tamaulipas on organized crime charges.

value.name: Lompoc Police Investigating Second Homicide in 11 Days After Teen Shot
value.description: A teenage boy was killed in Lompoc Friday night in a shooting believed to be related to gang activity, the city's second homicide in less than two weeks. At approximately 9 p.m., personnel from ...
